Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Protects tenants displaced due to fire
Summary: Provides that any tenant who is evicted or otherwise removed from a dwelling unit as a result of a vacate order issued by any governmental agency or department due to fire shall be entitled to a suitable accommodation; defines suitable accommodation; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง26-307, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to protecting tenants displaced due to fire
